DIA_Laurin_Hello_13_00: Hey, you! You don't want to go that way, do you?
DIA_Laurin_Hello_13_02: Man, I don't think you know where you're going!
DIA_Laurin_Hello_13_03: The beasts that inhabit this area will make mincemeat out of you.
DIA_Laurin_Hello_13_04: Turn back if you want to live.
DIA_Laurin_What_13_01: I warn your kind. There was a big mouth here not long ago who thought he was lord of the world.
DIA_Laurin_What_13_02: I haven't seen him since, he probably ended up in the stomach of some alligator or other monster.
